text: Ðis is þara X hida land boc æt west clearan þæ Eadgar cyning gebocodæ Ælfwine his þægne on ece yrfæ.
Ðis synd þa landgemere to West Clearan.
Erest þær sceapwæsce scet on aleburnan andlang aleburnan.
Of þam broce on cofring treow.
Of þam treowe on gerihte toweard rode.
Of þam æcere on wic herpað.
Of þam sede andlang weges on wiði graf.
Of þam hlewe on brið swiðe stane.
Of þam wille on sceapwæscan andland sceapwascan oþ<../images/tbar.gif>easte on aleburnan.
